description: This sweet and spiced root vegetable pie makes an impressive vegetarian main course dish and leftovers are perfect for lunch.
name: Spiced Root Vegetable & Feta Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red onions, peeled and chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Place the butternut squash, carrot and sweet potato in a roasting tin with the onions. Drizzle with a tablespoon of oil and the harissa and mix well to coat. Roast for 35-40 minutes.
Remove the vegetables from the oven and use a potato masher to mash to a chunky mix. Stir in the feta.

Line a greased, loose bottomed baking tin with two sheets of filo pastry brushed with oil, with the edges hanging over the side. Spoon in the vegetable filling, fold over the edges and slice the remaining 2 sheets into strips. Coat with oil and pile on top of the pie to make a loose lid. Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden and crisp.
